description: This file defines a React context provider for managing notes state in a frontend application. It includes state initialization, persistence via storage functions, and exposes context and hook for consuming notes data and actions.

methods.name: NotesProvider
methods.description: A React component that provides notes state and actions (add, edit, delete, persistence) via context to its children.

methods.name: useNotes
methods.description: A custom React hook that consumes the notes context, providing access to notes array and associated actions.
